charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS-did knowingly and intentionally combine, conspire, confederate and agree to possess with intent to distribute a substance containing a detectible amount of cocaine base, ie crack cocaine, a Schedule II narcotic controlled substance (1)

NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE-did knowingly and intentionally possess and cause the possession with the intent to distribute a substance containing a detectible amount of cocaine base, ie crack cocaine, a Schedule II narcotic controlled substance (2)
Did possess with intent to distribute crack cocaine

CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS-did knowingly and intentionally combine, conspire, confederate and agree to possess with intent to distribute a substance containing a detectible amount of cocaine base, ie crack cocaine, a Schedule II narcotic controlled substance (1)

NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE-did knowingly and intentionally possess and cause the possession with the intent to distribute a substance containing a detectible amount of cocaine base, ie crack cocaine, a Schedule II narcotic controlled substance (2)
